Caption: Figure 1: Virtuality continuum [Milgram 1994].
Mention:
Designing mixed reality applications for new domains 
demands careful consideration of the possibilities and 
restrictions of the environment. MR is a technology that 
involves the merging of real and virtual worlds somewhere 
along the “virtuality continuum” [Milgram 1994]. This 
connects completely real environments to completely virtual 
ones (cf. figure 1).  
The use of mixed reality enhances users’ perception of and 
interaction with the real world [Azuma 1997]. 
--------------------------------------------
